page.title: 08SOMERSHAM SCHOOL
page.content: Somersham school was built in 1878. Mobiles were later added.It has four classrooms and a hall.They have four teachers including a teaching headmaster.They have eighty children in the school.The school feeds Claydon High.The catchment area is Lt.Blakenham Nettlestead,Flowton,Offton,Bramford,but mostly Somersham. They have an annual fete on a midsummers day.They also have a Nativity service in there local church. They have a leavers party and disco every year.Every child is given a bible when they leave.School begins at 9:00am. First break is from 10:40am until 10:55am.Dinner is at 12:30pm. Second break is from 1:45pm to 2:00pm. Home time is 3:15pm.They have a small outdoor swimming pool but the juniors go to Hadleigh pools every Friday morning.
